scripts.styles:dev: node-sass src/assets/scss/ --output dist/assets/css/ --source-map true --source-map-contents true && postcss ./dist/assets/css/*.css --replace
scripts.styles:watch: node-sass src/assets/scss/ --output dist/assets/css/ --source-map true --source-map-contents true --watch && postcss ./dist/assets/css/*.css --replace
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean eleventy:default --parallel scripts:dev styles:dev eleventy:watch serve --print-label
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production run-s clean scripts:prod eleventy:default styles:prod --print-label
